name: Frisbee Shooter
description:
Shoot frisbees, improve your aim, improve your scores and accuracy to unlock new levels.

Also, enjoy the Dank memes.

Controles:

Mouse only

After making my first game ever on the recent Ludum Dare, I went to the next challenge and my goal is to make 1$ from a new game I make, and I gave myself a time limit of two weeks. I will probably make this game free after that but if you'd like to support me it would make my day.

Feedback is always welcome.
